title: SQLCREATE OR REPLACE VIEW Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLCREATE OR REPLACE VIEW Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Introduction
content_sections.content:
SQL
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW Keyword

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW
The
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW
command updates a view.
The following SQL adds the "City" column to the "Brazil Customers" view:
Example
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW [Brazil Customers] AS
SELECT CustomerName, ContactName, City
FROM Customers
WHERE Country = "Brazil";
Query The View
We can query the view above as follows:
Example
SELECT * FROM [Brazil 
  Customers];

Reference

❯
★
+1
